mapper.select: select a.*,b.prdt_nm from (select o.order_no ,o.recv_dt ,o.prog_info ,o.paprd_dt ,d.prdt_cd ,d.order_qty ,d.indica_qty ,d.oust_qty ,d.prdt_stc from order_tb o join order_d d on o.order_no=d.order_no) a join prdt b on a.prdt_cd=b.prdt_cd where a.order_no = #{orderNo} order by a.prdt_cd asc

select o.order_no ,o.recv_dt ,o.prog_info ,o.paprd_dt ,c.co_nm ,nvl((select REGEXP_REPLACE(listagg(prdt_cd,',') within group(order by prdt_cd),'([^,]+)(,\1)*(,|$)', '\1\3') from order_d where order_no =o.order_no),'없음') as deNum from order_tb o join co c on o.co_cd=c.co_cd where
TO_CHAR(o.recv_dt,'yyyyMMdd')>= TO_CHAR(#{startT},'yyyyMMdd') and TO_CHAR(o.recv_dt,'yyyyMMdd')<= TO_CHAR( #{endT},'yyyyMMdd')
TO_CHAR(o.paprd_dt,'yyyyMMdd')>= TO_CHAR(#{startT},'yyyyMMdd') and TO_CHAR(o.paprd_dt,'yyyyMMdd')<= TO_CHAR( #{endT},'yyyyMMdd')
and o.prog_info='진행'
and o.prog_info='종료'
o.prog_info='진행'
order by o.order_no asc
mapper.update: update order_d set prdt_stc= ((select count(prdt_lot) from prdt_stc where prdt_cd=#{prdtCd} and prdt_fg='I')-(select count(prdt_lot) from prdt_stc where prdt_cd=#{prdtCd} and prdt_fg='O')) where prdt_cd=#{prdtCd}
mapper.select: select '주문서 '||order_no||' 발주' title,recv_dt "start",paprd_dt+1 "end",'or' as "url" from order_tb

select '입고 '||count(*)||'건' as title ,prdt_dt as "start",'in' as "url" from prdt_stc where prdt_fg = 'I' and prdt_lot in (select prdt_lot from prdt_stc where prdt_fg='I') and prdt_lot not in (select prdt_lot from prdt_stc where prdt_fg='O' or prdt_fg='OW') group by prdt_dt
select '출고 '||slip_no as title, prdt_dt,'out' as "url" as "start" from oust
select rsc_cd||'가 '||decode(rsc_fg,1,'입고',0,'출고')||'된 수량 : '||rsc_qty as title,rsc_dt as "start" from rsc_inout
select e.eqm_cd||'에 '||u.uopr_nm||' 발생' as title,e.fr_tm as "start" from eqm_uo e join uopr_cd u on e.uopr_cd=u.uopr_cd
select e.eqm_cd||'에 '||u.uopr_nm||' 종료' as title,e.to_tm as "start" from eqm_uo e join uopr_cd u on e.uopr_cd=u.uopr_cd where e.to_tm is not null

select '제품 '||d.prdt_cd||'를 '||sum(d.indica_qty)||'개 생산지시' as title,i.indica_dt as "start" from indica i join indica_d d on i.indica_no=d.indica_no group by i.indica_no, i.indica_dt, d.prdt_cd, i.indica_nm
